languages.text: "Признаться, вначале я был... обеспокоен особым интересом Священной Инквизиции к Кьяве Гамма. После того, что мы увидели на индустриальном мире, я рад, что глубокоуважаемый дознаватель все же был с нами".

"I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, вначале я был... обеспокоен особым интересом Священной Инквизиции к Кьяве Гамма. После того, что мы увидели на индустриальном мире, я рад, что глубокоуважаемый дознаватель все же был с нами".

traits.locale_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我必须承认我……曾十分担忧基亚瓦伽马星引起了审判庭的特别兴趣。然而，当我目睹了那个工业世界发生的一切之后，我很欣慰地意识到，我们这位备受尊敬的审讯官最终是站在我们这边的。”
languages.original_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."

traits.locale_text: “我必须承认我……曾十分担忧基亚瓦伽马星引起了审判庭的特别兴趣。然而，当我目睹了那个工业世界发生的一切之后，我很欣慰地意识到，我们这位备受尊敬的审讯官最终是站在我们这边的。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'avoue m'être... fourvoyé quant aux intentions de la Sainte Inquisition à Kiava Gamma. Vu les événements du monde industriel, je suis soulagé de voir que l'honorable interrogateur est bien de notre côté. »
languages.original_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."

traits.locale_text: « J'avoue m'être... fourvoyé quant aux intentions de la Sainte Inquisition à Kiava Gamma. Vu les événements du monde industriel, je suis soulagé de voir que l'honorable interrogateur est bien de notre côté. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Debo admitir que tenía mis... reservas con respecto al interés de la Santa Inquisición por Kiava Gamma. Sin embargo, tras ver lo que vimos en el mundo industrial, me alegro de que el estimado Interrogador nos acompañara».
languages.original_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."

traits.locale_text: «Debo admitir que tenía mis... reservas con respecto al interés de la Santa Inquisición por Kiava Gamma. Sin embargo, tras ver lo que vimos en el mundo industrial, me alegro de que el estimado Interrogador nos acompañara».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「正直に言いましょう…聖異端審問庁はとりわけ、キアヴァ・ガンマに関心を持っているのではないかと懸念していました。ですが産業惑星でのできごとを受けて結局、実に立派なインテロゲイターが我々についてくれたと安心しています」
languages.original_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."

traits.locale_text: 「正直に言いましょう…聖異端審問庁はとりわけ、キアヴァ・ガンマに関心を持っているのではないかと懸念していました。ですが産業惑星でのできごとを受けて結局、実に立派なインテロゲイターが我々についてくれたと安心しています」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss gestehen, dass ich ... Bedenken hatte, was das Interesse der Heiligen Inquisition an Kiava Gamma angeht. Doch nach den Geschehnissen auf der Produktionswelt bin ich doch erleichtert, dass der hochverehrte Interrogator bei uns war."
languages.original_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss gestehen, dass ich ... Bedenken hatte, was das Interesse der Heiligen Inquisition an Kiava Gamma angeht. Doch nach den Geschehnissen auf der Produktionswelt bin ich doch erleichtert, dass der hochverehrte Interrogator bei uns war."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."

languages.text: "Kutsal Engizisyon'un Kiava Gama'ya olan özel ilgisinden başta rahatsızlık duyduğumu itiraf etmeliyim. Ancak sınai dünyada gördüklerimizden sonra, pek saygıdeğer Sorgucu'nun yanımızda olması içimi rahatlattı."
languages.original_text: "I must admit that I had... misgivings about the Holy Inquisition's particular interest in Kiava Gamma. But after what we saw on the industrial world, I am relieved that the deeply esteemed Interrogator was with us after all."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal Engizisyon'un Kiava Gama'ya olan özel ilgisinden başta rahatsızlık duyduğumu itiraf etmeliyim. Ancak sınai dünyada gördüklerimizden sonra, pek saygıdeğer Sorgucu'nun yanımızda olması içimi rahatlattı."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
